transcript.text: hello Shalom Shalom it is day six of
Sukkot happy sukkot everyone this is the
Casa Loma castle Henry Pellatt lived
here approximately 10 years garden
fountain
beautiful beautiful castle and anyway
I'm here with my friends enjoying this
beautiful castle on day 6 of the feast
of Sukkot and today I just want to talk
a little bit about how you know you see
this beautiful mansion right behind me
it was beautiful castle casa loma you
know the mansions that Yash was going to
make for us says he goes away to a place
to prepare mansion for us just like the
groom will go with the help of his
father to prepare a place for his bride
before he would take her as a wife at a
wedding ceremony and in the same way for
the last 2,000 years Yahshua after he
ascended to the skies on mount Olive's
10 days prior to Shavuot Pentecost he
has been for the last 2,000 years
preparing for us mansions so as
beautiful as this castle hey look this
is nothing compared to the mansions that
Yahshua is prepared for those who love
him to obey Him and keep his
Commandments but you don't get this
mansion unconditionally you don't get to
be with Yahshua unconditionally his his
promises and blessings are conditional
their conditional in the fact that
you're willing to obey the Torah you're
willing to keep the Sabbath from Friday
night to Saturday night you're willing
to wear the ZZ we're going to put the
head covering on you're willing to love
your neighbors yourself they're willing
to take your tithe and give it to the
poor or save your tithe and use it for
the feast days like Sukkot in other
words you want people who are going to
be obedient to him and people who are
going to implement the word of Yahweh
into their own lives and hearts so if we
want to partake of the blessings that he
wants to give us it's conditioned upon
the fact that we're willing to walk in
obedience to his Commandments from
Genesis all the way to Revelation so
happy sukkot everyone happy sixth day of
sukkot Shalom Shalom from Toronto Canada
